def_cn: 无效审判(指由于没有考虑到所有证据等原因造成审判不公正，所以必须重新审判)
def_en: A mistrial is a legal trial that is conducted unfairly, for example because not all the evidence is considered, so that there must be a new trial.

def_cn: (由于陪审团意见不一致等而产生的)未决审判，失审
def_en: A mistrial is a legal trial which ends without a verdict, for example because the jury cannot agree on one.
